column6: GHOST PART 2 Lost in the snowy vastness of Siberia, Reed, Ben and Johnny discover what they never hoped to find --- the wreckage of Susan Storm's aircraft! Who brought Sue down, and has the Invisible Woman disappeared for good?
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Brooks | writer:Mike Carey | inker:Jaime Mendoza | letterer:Rus Wooton
